title: JAFAX's website gets a new design!
content:
Today we're happy to announce the new design for JAFAX 2020's website! While it may only look like we've moved some stuff around and reskinned the look, don't be fooled.

This change will allow future impromovements for our staff to post content quicker, and other things that will make it more convenient for you, our visitors.

Take a look around!
